abstract: Indicators point to fresh lows, although analysts note that bear markets can produce short-lived rallies that are hard to distinguish from the real thing.
snippet: Indicators point to fresh lows, although analysts note that bear markets can produce short-lived rallies that are hard to distinguish from the real thing.
lead_paragraph: THE economy looks bleak, corporate earnings are shrinking and the public mood is sour and nervous. No wonder the stock market has trouble putting a winning streak together.

headline.main: Just How Low Will the Dow Go?
headline.print_headline: How Low Will the Dow Go?
